title: Team Picker
custom_steps:
When user fresh installs MLB app
and launches the app for the first time
custom_expected: Then the user will be presented with a team picker after the splash screen

title: Sort Order
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been fresh installed
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the app for the first time
and is going through onboarding
and is viewing the team picker
custom_expected: Then the teams will be listed in alphabetical order, based off of their city or state name

title: My Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the app for the first time
and is going through onboarding
and is viewing the team picker
and taps the green plus sign next to a team name
custom_expected:
Then that team will be added to a new "My Teams" section above the "Teams" section
and will have a red minus sign next to the team name
and the team name under the "Teams" section will no longer have a green plus

title: Adding More Teams to My Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the app for the first time
and is going through onboarding
and is viewing the team picker
and has added a team to the "My Teams" section
and adds a another team to the "My Teams" section
custom_expected:
Then all of "My Teams" will have red minus signs next to their name in the "My Teams" section
and all of "My Teams" will have an icon to their right to indicate that they can be re-ordered

title: Reordering My Teams
custom_preconds: Given MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the app for the first time
and is going through onboarding
and is viewing the team picker
and has added multiple teams to the "My Teams" section
and taps to re-order the teams
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to successfully re-order the teams in the "My Teams" section

title: Removing Team from My Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the app for the first time
and is going through onboarding
and is viewing the team picker
and has added team(s) to the "My Teams" section
and taps the red minus sign next to the team name
and then taps to Delete the team
custom_expected:
Then the team will be removed from the "My Teams" section
and the green plus sign will be re-added to their team name in the "Teams" section

title: Team Picker
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a team page by tapping it from the bottom nav tab
and taps the team logo at the top
custom_expected: Then the user will be presented with a team picker

title: Sort Order
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is viewing a team page by tapping on it from the bottom nav tab
custom_steps:
When the user taps the team logo at the top
and is viewing the team picker
custom_expected: Then the teams will be listed in alphabetical order, based off of their city or state name

title: My Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is viewing a team page by tapping on it from the bottom nav tab
custom_steps:
When the user taps the team logo at the top
and is viewing the team picker
and has previously selected team(s)
custom_expected:
Then there will be a "My Teams" section above the "Teams" section
and the selected team(s) will be listed there

title: View-Only
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is viewing a team page by tapping on it from the bottom nav tab
custom_steps:
When the user taps the team logo at the top
and is viewing the team picker
custom_expected:
Then the team picker will be view-only
and the user will not be able to add team(s) to "My Teams" or to re-order their teams

title: Launching Team Page from Picker
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is viewing a team page by tapping on it from the bottom nav tab
custom_steps:
When the user taps the team logo at the top
and is viewing the team picker
and taps on a team name
custom_expected: Then that team's team page will open

title: Sort Order - News
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is on the News Index
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
custom_expected: Then the teams will be listed in alphabetical order, based off of their city or state name

title: My Teams - News
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is viewing the News Index
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
custom_expected:
Then there will be a "My Teams" section above the "Teams" section
and the set team(s) will be listed there

title: View-Only - News
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is viewing the News Index
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
custom_expected:
Then the team picker will be view-only
and the user will not be able to add team(s) to "My Teams" or to re-order their teams

title: Launching Team Index from Picker - News
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is viewing the News Index
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
and taps on a team name
custom_expected: Then that team's News index will open

title: Sort Order - Videos
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is on the Video Index (on iPhone, from News index, switch over to Videos tab)
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
custom_expected: Then the teams will be listed in alphabetical order, based off of their city or state name

title: My Teams - Videos
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is on the Video Index (on iPhone, from News index, switch over to Videos tab)
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
custom_expected:
Then there will be a "My Teams" section above the "Teams" section
and the set team(s) will be listed there

title: View-Only - Videos
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is on the Video Index (on iPhone, from News index, switch over to Videos tab)
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
custom_expected:
Then the team picker will be view-only
and the user will not be able to add team(s) to "My Teams" or to re-order their teams

title: Launching Team Index from Picker - Videos
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has set a team to "My Teams"
and the user is on the Video Index (on iPhone, from News index, switch over to Videos tab)
custom_steps:
When the user taps the MLB drop down at the top
and is viewing the team/index picker
and taps on a team name
custom_expected: Then that team's Video index will open

title: Team Picker
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the More Menu
and taps on "Teams"
custom_expected: Then the user will be presented with a team picker

title: Sort Order
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the More Menu
and taps on "Teams"
and is viewing the team picker
custom_expected: Then the teams will be listed in alphabetical order, based off of their city or state name

title: My Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and has previously set team(s) as "My Teams"
custom_steps:
When the user is on the More Menu
and taps on "Teams"
and is viewing the team picker
custom_expected:
Then there will be a "My Teams" section above the "Teams" section
and the selected team(s) will be listed there

title: My Teams (None)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and has NOT previously set team(s) as "My Teams"
custom_steps:
When the user is on the More Menu
and taps on "Teams"
and is viewing the team picker
custom_expected: Then there will not be a "My Teams" section above the "Teams" section

title: View-Only
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the More Menu
and taps on "Teams"
and is viewing the team picker
custom_expected:
Then the team picker will be view-only
and the user will not be able to add team(s) to "My Teams" or to re-order their teams

title: Launching Team Page from Picker
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the More Menu
and taps on "Teams"
and is viewing the team picker
and taps on a team name
custom_expected: Then that team's team page will open

title: Team Picker
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the More Menu
and taps on "Account" to launch Account Settings
and taps on "My Teams" in the "My Account" section
custom_expected:
Then the user will be presented with a team picker
and if they had previously selected team(s)
then they will appear under the "My Teams" section

title: Sort Order
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navs to Account Settings
and taps on "My Teams" in the "My Account" section
custom_expected: Then the teams will be listed in alphabetical order, based off of their city or state name

title: My Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team picker from "Account Settings"
and taps the green plus sign next to a team name
custom_expected:
Then that team will be added to a new "My Teams" section above the "Teams" section
and will have a red minus sign next to the team name
and the team name under the "Teams" section will no longer have a green plus

title: Adding More Teams to My Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team picker from "Account Settings"
and has added a team to the "My Teams" section
and adds a another team to the "My Teams" section
custom_expected:
Then all of "My Teams" will have red minus signs next to their name in the "My Teams" section
and all of "My Teams" will have an icon to their right to indicate that they can be re-ordered

title: Reordering My Teams
custom_preconds: Given MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team picker from "Account Settings"
and has added multiple teams to the "My Teams" section
and taps to re-order the teams
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to successfully re-order the teams in the "My Teams" section

title: Removing Team from My Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team picker from "Account Settings"
and has added team(s) to the "My Teams" section
and taps the red minus sign next to the team name
and then taps to Delete the team
custom_expected:
Then the team will be removed from the "My Teams" section
and the green plus sign will be re-added to their team name in the "Teams" section

title: Notification Settings
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app has been installed
and the user has previously set team(s) to "My Teams"
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the More Menu
and taps on "Account" to launch Account Settings
and taps "Notifications"
custom_expected:
Then there will be a "My Teams" section between the "MLB" and the "Teams" sections
and the selected team(s) will be listed there with their notification settings
